PrivacyJobSession.name: PrivacyJobSession
PrivacyJobSession.description: Represents the status of past, ongoing, and scheduled policy jobs in Privacy Center.

CreationDate.description: The date and time the policy job was created.

CurrentObject.description: The name of the object that the policy job is currently processing.

EndTime.description: The date and time the policy job finished executing.

FailureLog.description: The description of why the policy job failed to execute.

JobStartType.description: How the policy job session was started.

JobStatus.description: Represents the status of the policy job session.

Name.description: Represents the job session record. This is a serialized, automatically generated number field.

OptionsProcessingFailed.description: Indicates that the policy job session failed to process the records with the deletion or masking rules in the policy.

OptionsTraversalComplete.description: Indicates that the policy job session was completed without errors.

OptionsTraversalFailed.description: Indicates that the policy job session was completed with errors.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

PolicyDescription.description: The description of the policy the job session is associated with.

PolicyName.description: The name of the policy the job session is associated with.

PolicyType.description: The type of policy the job session is associated with.

PrivacyPolicyDefinitionId.description: The ID of the policy the job session is executing for.

PrivacyRtbfRequestId.description: The ID of the Right to Be Forgotten request the policy job is executing for.

ScheduledTime.description: The date and time the policy job session is scheduled to run.

SerializedPolicy.description: The serial ID of a snapshot of the policy the job session is for. A snapshot of the policy is taken to maintain consistent metadata for the policy the job is for, in case changes are made to the policy while the job is executing.

StartTime.description: The date and time the policy job session started executing.
